flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the darkndepths of forests. They are oftennfound keeping still under fallen leaves.fThis POKéMON feeds on compost thatnis made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
If SHROOMISH senses danger, it shakesnits body and scatters spores from thentop of its head.fThis POKéMON’s spores are so toxic,nthey make trees and weeds wilt.
It loves to eat damp, composted soil innforests. If you enter a forest after anlong rain, you can see many SHROOMISHnfeasting on composted soil.
It prefers damp places. By day it remainsnstill in the forest shade. It releasesntoxic powder from its head.
It prefers damp places. By day it remainsnstill in the forest shade. It releasesntoxic powder from its head.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
If it senses danger, it scattersnspores from the top of its head tonprotect itself.
If it senses danger, it scattersnspores from the top of its head tonprotect itself.
Le sommet de sa tête libère desnspores empoisonnées. Il estndangereux de les inhaler.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
Le sommet de sa tête libère desnspores empoisonnées. Il estndangereux de les inhaler.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
It spouts poison spores from thentop of its head. These sporesncause pain all over if inhaled.
しめった　ばしょを　このみ　ひるまはnもりの　こかげで　じっと　している。nあたまから　どくの　こなを　だす。
습한 장소를 좋아해서 낮에는n숲의 그늘에서 가만히 있다.n머리에서 독가루를 뿌린다.
Il préfère les endroits humides. La journée, il restenà la lisière de la forêt. Il libère de la poudre toxiquenpar sa tête.
Es bevorzugt feuchte Orte. Am Tag sitzt esnregungslos im Schatten des Waldes. Von seinemnKopf sondert es einen giftigen Puder ab.
Prefiere los sitios húmedos. De día está tranquilamentenen el bosque, a la sombra. Expulsa polvo tóxico por lancabeza.
Predilige le aree umide. Di giorno resta immobilennell’ombra della foresta. Dal capo rilascia polverentossica.
It prefers damp places. By day it remains still innthe forest shade. It releases toxic powder fromnits head.
湿った　場所を　好み　昼間はn森の　木陰で　じっと　している。n頭から　毒の　粉を　出す。
あたまの　てっぺんから　どくほうしをnふきだす。ほうしを　すいこむとnからだの　ふしぶしが　いたくなる。
머리의 정수리에서 독 포자를n뿜어낸다. 포자를 들이마시면n몸의 마디마디가 아파진다.
Le sommet de sa tête libère des sporesnempoisonnées. Il est dangereux de les inhaler.
Es setzt an seinem Kopf Giftsporen frei. Werden dieseneingeatmet, verursachen sie Schmerzen.
Lanza esporas venenosas desde la parte superior denla cabeza. Inhalarlas es muy doloroso.
Sparge spore tossiche dalla sommità del capo. Seninalate, queste spore provocano dolore in tutto ilncorpo.
It spouts poison spores from the top of its head.nThese spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
頭の　てっぺんから　毒胞子をn噴き出す。胞子を　吸いこむとn体の　節々が　痛くなる。
ふかい　もりの　しめった　じめんに　せいそく。nおちばの　したで　じっとしていることが　おおい。nおちばが　つもって　できた　ふようどを　たべる。
깊은 숲의 축축한 땅에 서식한다.n낙엽 밑에서 꼼짝하지 않고 있을 때가 많다.n낙엽이 쌓여 만들어진 부엽토를 먹는다.

Les Balignon vivent dans les sols humides et les recoinsnsombres des grandes forêts. On les trouve souvent immobilesnsous les feuilles mortes. Ce Pokémon se nourrit d’un compostnfait de feuilles mortes pourries.
Knilz lebt im feuchten Erdboden finsterer Wälder. Es wirdnoft reglos unter herabgefallenen Blättern gefunden. DiesesnPokémon ernährt sich von Kompost aus verrotteten Blättern.
Los Shroomish viven en zonas húmedas en la profundanoscuridad del bosque. Suelen quedarse tranquilamente bajonlas hojas caídas. Se alimentan del abono que estas generan alnempezar a pudrirse.
Shroomish vive nel suolo umido nel cuore della foresta buia.nSpesso si nasconde sotto le foglie cadute. Si ciba dell’humusncreato dal letto di foglie decomposte sul terreno.
Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests.nThey are often found keeping still under fallen leaves.nThis Pokémon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen,nrotted leaves.
深い　森の　湿った　地面に　生息。n落ち葉の　下で　じっとしていることが　多い。n落ち葉が　積もって　できた　腐葉土を　食べる。
きけんを　かんじると　からだを　ふるわせてnあたまの　てっぺんから　ほうしを　ばらまくぞ。nくさきも　しおれてしまうほどの　もうどくだ。
위험을 느끼면 몸을 흔들어n머리의 정수리에서 포자를 뿌린다.n풀과 나무가 시들 정도의 맹독이다.
Lorsque Balignon sent un danger, il secoue son corps etnrépand ses spores du haut de sa tête. Les spores de cenPokémon sont si toxiques qu’elles font dépérir les arbresnet les herbes.
Wenn Knilz Gefahr wittert, schüttelt es seinen Körper undnverteilt Sporen von seinem Kopf. Diese Sporen sind so giftig,ndass Bäume und Gräser davon eingehen.
Si Shroomish siente peligro, agita el cuerpo y libera esporasnvenenosas por la cabeza. Estas esporas son tan tóxicas quenpueden hacer que se marchiten los árboles y hasta las malasnhierbas.
In caso di pericolo Shroomish agita il proprio corpo spargendonspore dalla sommità del capo. Le spore di questo Pokémonnsono così tossiche da far appassire fiori e piante.
If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scattersnspores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores arenso toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
危険を　感じると　体を　震わせてn頭の　てっぺんから　胞子を　ばらまくぞ。n草木も　しおれてしまうほどの　猛毒だ。
